row.name: Abomination
row.description: When allied champions have died, the Monstrosity will rise from its grave. The Monstrosity receives bonus Health and Attack Damage based on allied Abomination champions' star levels. The 3 Abomination champions nearest the grave will also grant the Monstrosity a random copy of one of their items when combat starts.

row.name: Assassin
row.innate: When combat starts, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.
row.description: Assassins’ Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.

row.name: Brawler
row.description: Brawlers gain additional maximum Health.

row.name: Caretaker
row.description: Caretakers deploy with a Baby Dragon that can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. The Baby Dragon gains a percentage of its Caretaker's Attack Speed, and restores Mana to the Caretaker upon death.

row.name: Cavalier
row.innate: Cavaliers charge quickly towards their target whenever they move.
row.description: Cavaliers take reduced damage. At the start of combat and after each charge, this effect is doubled for several seconds.

row.name: Coven
row.description: At the start of combat, the champion nearest to the center of your Coven champions is chosen as the Coven Leader, gaining bonus Ability Power. Each time a Coven champion casts, a percentage of the cost is bestowed upon the Coven Leader as Mana.

row.name: Cruel
row.description: A Cruel champion hungers to be alone against exactly 1 enemy left standing. Cruel champions are purchased with Little Legend Health instead of gold. They can be sold for gold, but not Health. You're welcome.

row.name: Dawnbringer
row.description: Dawnbringers rapidly heal some of their maximum Health the first time they drop below a percentage of their Health. When this occurs, all allied Dawnbringers gain bonus damage.

row.name: Draconic
row.description: At the end of each player combat, gain a dragon egg on your bench. The bigger the egg, the longer it takes to hatch, and the rarer the reward. Golden eggs hatch into even rarer loot. In Hyper Roll, dragon eggs hatch a lot faster!

row.name: Dragonslayer
row.description: Dragonslayers always gain bonus Ability Power. After the first Dragonslayer ally scores a takedown on an enemy with certain amount of Health, all allies gain additional Ability Power for the rest of combat.

row.name: Eternal
row.description: Wolf separates from Lamb, and can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. Wolf does not count toward your team size, and receives all of Lamb's stat bonuses.

row.name: Forgotten
row.description: Forgotten champions have bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. Each Shadow item held by a Forgotten champion increases these bonuses by a percentage on all Forgotten champions, stacking up several times.

row.name: God-Kings
row.description: God-Kings deal bonus damage to enemies who have at least one of their Rival Traits. This effect is only active when you have exactly 1 unique God-King. Garen's Rivals: Forgotten, Nightbringer, Coven, Hellion, Dragonslayer, Abomination, Revenant. Darius' Rivals: Redeemed, Dawnbringer, Verdant, Draconic, Ironclad.

row.name: Hellion
row.description: Hellions gain Attack Speed. Whenever a Hellion dies, a Doppelhellion (a one less star copy) will leap from the Hellion portal and join the fight!

row.name: Invoker
row.description: All allies gain extra Mana from their attacks.

row.name: Ironclad
row.description: All allies gain Armor.

row.name: Knight
row.description: All allies block a flat amount of damage from all sources.

row.name: Legionnaire
row.description: Legionnaires gain bonus Attack Speed, and their first attack after casting an Ability heals them for a percentage of the damage dealt.

row.name: Mystic
row.description: All allies gain Magic Resist.

row.name: Nightbringer
row.description: Nightbringers gain a shield for several seconds equal to a percent of their maximum Health the first time they drop below a percentage of their maximum Health. When this occurs, that Nightbringer gains bonus damage.

row.name: Ranger
row.description: Rangers gain and lose bonus Attack Speed periodically. This effect begins after a delay after combat starts.

row.name: Redeemed
row.description: Redeemed champions have increased Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power. When they die, their bonus is split among remaining Redeemed allies.

row.name: Renewer
row.description: Renewers heal for a percent of their maximum Health each second. If they're full Health, they restore Mana instead.

row.name: Revenant
row.description: Revenants revive after their first death each combat. Once revived, they take and deal increased damage.

row.name: Skirmisher
row.description: Skirmishers gain a shield at the start of combat, and bonus Attack Damage each second.

row.name: Spellweaver
row.description: Spellweavers have bonus Ability Power, which increases whenever any champion uses an ability stacking up several times.

row.name: Verdant
row.description: Champions that start combat adjacent to at least one Verdant ally are immune to crowd control for a duration.
